metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13167 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the kernel sound timer. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID A-37240993.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13167` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:
